title: The Elizabeth Holmes Trial: Founder Recounts ‘Big Idea’ That Led to Creation of Theranos
sub_head: Holmes says early feedback from scientists fueled her optimism about startup’s blood-testing technology
body:
SAN JOSE, Calif—Elizabeth Holmes took jurors into the Theranos Inc. lab Monday during her continued testimony at her criminal-fraud trial, describing ways the startup sought to reduce errors in lab testing and miniaturize traditionally bulky blood-testing machines.
“We thought this was a really big idea,” Ms. Holmes said of Theranos’s attempts to remove human error from steps involved in the testing process by automating it.
